data.name: Elevator 500
data.detailed_description:
What is Elevator 500 and why does it deserve the GOTY?



This game was inspired by the anti-piracy screens of some video games, I thought it was a good concept to have a game with a story and to interfere with this kind of bugs, sounds, etc.[/i]

Suspense, a bit of fear and joy are the emotions that this game will make you feel, plus your only way to move around will be your hook, which will take you wherever you point your mouse

Why Suspense?
This is because there will be some situations and scenarios that the game will put you in and you will have to know how to get out of them or get into them
Why Fear? [/b]
You may hear a sound or two that may scare you Why Joy?
Why Joy? Because you are going to be the first ones in the world[/i].
Because it's going to be the best inversion in your whole life.

Let's see what the reviewers(not friends) have to say about this game

.
Tercocorsario460
"The game is corrupt and was created by illuminati, well the only creator: juani"

Eth1801
"I find this game very addictive as its gameplay is one of the most interesting and creative, I recommend it"

XxTuabhuelaYTxX
"Elevator 500 is a game that caught my attention because from the beginning when I knew it was called drawpin and it was a game that in my opinion was good for the interesting gameplay and because I got a key:p, a point that I did not like was the character xd"

data.short_description: A point and click walking simulator, your only way to move around will be your hook.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 3220
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 3220
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
